code: function menuItem(theme){var palette=theme.palette,borders=theme.borders,transitions=theme.transitions;var white=palette.white;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;return{display:"flex",alignItems:"center",width:"100%",color:white.main,py:1,px:2,borderRadius:borderRadius.md,transition:transitions.create("background-color",{easing:transitions.easing.easeInOut,duration:transitions.duration.standard}),"&:not(:last-child)":{mb:1.25},"&:hover":{opacity:0.9,background:"transparent"},"&:focus":{opacity:0.9,background:"transparent"}};}function menuImage(theme,ownerState){var functions=theme.functions,palette=theme.palette,borders=theme.borders;var color=ownerState.color;var linearGradient=functions.linearGradient;var gradients=palette.gradients;var borderRadius=borders.borderRadius;return{display:"grid",placeItems:"center",backgroundImage:gradients[color]?linearGradient(gradients[color].main,gradients[color].state):linearGradient(gradients.dark.main,gradients.dark.state),"& img":{width:"100%",borderRadius:borderRadius.lg}};}export{menuItem,menuImage};
